name: @janhq/test
description: This is a wrapper in node of nitro cli, a high-efficiency C++ inference engine for edge computing, powering Jan. It is lightweight and embeddable, ideal for product integration.

scripts.downloadnitro:linux: NITRO_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').nitroVersion") && if [ "$GPU" = "true" ]; then download https://github.com/janhq/nitro/releases/download/v${NITRO_VERSION}/nitro-${NITRO_VERSION}-linux-amd64-cuda.zip -e --strip 1 -o ./nitro && chmod +x ./nitro/nitro; else download https://github.com/janhq/nitro/releases/download/v${NITRO_VERSION}/nitro-${NITRO_VERSION}-linux-amd64.zip -e --strip 1 -o ./nitro && chmod +x ./nitro/nitro; fi
scripts.downloadnitro:darwin: NITRO_VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').nitroVersion") && ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "arm64" ]; then download https://github.com/janhq/nitro/releases/download/v${NITRO_VERSION}/nitro-${NITRO_VERSION}-mac-arm64.zip -e --strip 1 -o ./nitro && chmod +x ./nitro/nitro; else download https://github.com/janhq/nitro/releases/download/v${NITRO_VERSION}/nitro-${NITRO_VERSION}-mac-amd64.zip -e --strip 1 -o ./nitro && chmod +x ./nitro/nitro; fi

author: service@jan.ai
